content:
本行保存
DEPARTMENT OF STATE AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT UNITED STATES AID MISSION TO CHINA
MC- 3861
MAY 28 1962
Mr. K. T. Li Secretary General Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Subject:
Audit Report No. A-1711
Arrival and Disposal of
Excess Property
Dear Mr. Li:
Transmitted herewith for your information and implementation are six (6) copies of the subject audit report.
The Mission would appreciate being kept informed on what action is being undertaken by CUSA in implementing the recommendations contained in the report.
140.112.213.82
Sincerely yours,
W. C. Haraldson Director
Encl: As stated
